name: PictoParty
overview: Gather around for a fun evening with PictoParty! Challenge your friends or family in a game all about drawing and guessing. Take turns and draw the words you see on the Wii U GamePad touch screen – the image is simultaneously drawn on the TV screen so that everyone can try to guess the answer. Up to 15 players can play at once using one Wii U GamePad, or up to 24 players can get involved in teams! Choose from existing dictionaries, packed with more than 700 words, or get creative and make your own lists. The possibilities are endless! Up to 15 players can play at once using one Wii U GamePad Get creative and add new words Play all-against-all or play in teams Family fun for all ages
